actions.text: Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 3299. All points of order against the conference report and against is consideration are waived. The conference report shall be considered as read when called up for consideration if copies of the conference report have been available to Members for at least two hours.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 101-364, by Mr. Moakley.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 85.
Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 400, H. Res. 291 is laid on the table.

official_title: Waiving all points of order against the conference report on the bill (H.R. 3299) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to section 5 of the concurrent resolution on the budget for the fiscal year 1990, and against the consideration of such conference report.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the conference report on H.R. 3299 (budget reconciliation) and against its consideration.

titles.title: Waiving all points of order against the conference report on the bill (H.R. 3299) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to section 5 of the concurrent resolution on the budget for the fiscal year 1990, and against the consideration of such conference report.
